sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_698230_my_custom.CheckAttachmentCatalogItem</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>CheckAttachmentCatalogItem</name><script><![CDATA[var CheckAttachmentCatalogItem = Class.create();
CheckAttachmentCatalogItem.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

checkAttachment: function(){
var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_attachment");
gr.addQuery('table_name', "sc_cart_item");
gr.addQuery('table_sys_id', this.getParameter('sysparm_catalog_id'));
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
         return 'yes';
}
	else{
        return 'no';
}
},
    type: 'CheckAttachmentCatalogItem'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>akanksha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-28 10:36:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>8ce3eca44722a51026847688c26d435e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CheckAttachmentCatalogItem</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My custom App" source="x_698230_my_custom">d01a706f475e611026847688c26d438c</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="My custom App">d01a706f475e611026847688c26d438c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8ce3eca44722a51026847688c26d435e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>akanksha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-28 10:38:54</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
